lines.content: Duke Pro is a desktop app for managing tasks, optimized for use via a Command Line Interface (CLI). User will not have to remember tasks details and it can be found easily with commands.
1. Ensure you have Java 11 or above installed in your computer.
3. Copy the file to the folder you want to use as the home folder for your Duke Pro.
4. Open a command window in that folder .
6. Type the command in the command box and press Enter to execute it. Refer to the Features below for details of each command.
/* For user to manage their tasks and deadline */
